1.content:
One day while coming from work you found a parcel in your mailbox. Curiously you opened it and saw that it contained a diary and an accompanying letter. To find out what this was all about you decided to read the letter...

Hello! I guess you're wondering why there's a diary in your mail today. Well, let me explain. It's my diary, and it contains the story of how I became capable of transforming myself. Transforming myself? you might wonder?
No, I'm not axe-crazy! Read it to find out how I got this ability!

Now this pokes your interest. Curious you open the small notebook.


Entry #1 (09/02/2010):

Dear diary, this is my first entry. Oh well, I'm just starting this whole thing so I have something were I can record my experiences with my new ability. You see, I can transform myself! Crazy, huh?
I'll tell you how I got that strange ability, but first I should tell you a little bit about myself. My name is...
1.title: Diary in the mail...

choices: I was researching in the library for an assignment.
One night, I was abducted by aliens.
I got into an accident involving a strange chemical.
I found out about my family's secret - we were shapeshifters!
11.content:
My name is Kelly, and I'm a high school senior, in my last year actually. I'm 5.6 feet tall, have a quite slender figure and auburn hair and am a cheerleader.

That whole transformation stuff started when...
11.title: Kelly, and I'm in my last year of high school.

111.content:
... I was researching in the library for an assignment. Well, the topic was of course not "Find a magic book containing working transformation spells.", that was more or less a coincidence.

http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/2544/...

As I was searching in the history apartment I must've picked up this old, dusty book with the title "Knjiga magije" together with more contemporary literature on the Salem Witch Trials. When I took a seat on a library table I methodically went through each of the books, making notes.

Only when I opened the "Knjiga magije" I got confronted with a seemingly unmountable problem. Damn, it's in a foreign language!. Just then I had a solution for that one.

Quickly I pulled out my mobile and fired up a web browser, next I went to Google Translator and typed in the book's title. "Book of magic, yeah, right...", but I was mildly interested nonetheless. So I typed the first paragraph of text in. "Beware, this book contains real magic! Of course!", next I decided to turn to a random page. "Transformation spell: Imagine the transformation you want to achieve and speak these words: ecno tihs'otniu oynrut l'liws iht. Huh, why can't Google translate that?". Puzzled I decided to give it a try and imagined the pencil I held turning into a full-fledged ballpoint pen. Next I incanted the magic words - and was shocked to see it really worked! My pencil really became a pen in the matter of seconds.

"No fucking way!". Just then I looked at the watch. "Oh shit, class continues in 10 minutes!". Since I knew that what I found was far too precious to just forget I scribbled the magic phrase on a piece of paper which I stuffed in my wallet. Next I packed my bag and went off to...
111.title: History assignment!

choices: After a while someone came in!
Luckily the note with the spell landed in the bowl with me!
1112.content:
... the restroom because I had to take a leak.

http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9631/...

Once I got in there I saw only two empty stalls. Quickly I got into one, seated myself and 'let it flow'.

http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/6905/...

Unfortunately my bladder is not exactly the smallest one you can imagine, and I drank a lot that day! Right in the middle of my pee the restroom door suddenly opened and I heard someone entering the other stall. Next I finished and made a grab for some toilet paper...

... only to find out there was none in the dispenser. "Oh..." I mumbled - and just then I had an idea. See, I was kind of too shy to ask the person in the other stall to give me some sheets - it was high school after all, and I needed no rumors floating around. So without giving much thought I pulled the note with the spell from my wallet and imagined the toilet brush turning into a roll of toilet paper. "Ecno tihs'otniu oynrut l'liws iht" I was chanting away when suddenly I heard a thunderous Pfft!, followed by a wet splash. Momentarily distracted I thought I'm glad it's not me that has the squirts!.

Bad, bad imagination running wild I tell you, because next I felt something happening to myself! The next thing was I found myself not sitting on the bowl, but actually swimming inside of it.
"What?" I gasped, but just then I saw my reflection on the walls of the toilet bowl. See, I don't really want to get into that too much, you can probably guess what I turned into. Suffice to say it was a rather repulsive sight, and the next thing I did was...

"Eew!" it echoed in the restroom. "What, what's the matter?" it suddenly came from the other stall. "Uh, nothing, just saw a spider, everything's fine!" I lied - turning into sentient dysentery was definitely not fine in my books! "Eh, okay..." it came the person's answer, next I heard the flush and a door opening!

Next the person put on the tap, quickly washed her hands and exited the restroom. Which meant I was basically alone in there - transformed into the living contents of a toilet bowl.

http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/2061/... (there's no sickening stuff on there, just two "empty" restroom stalls!)

"Great!" I mumbled, but just then my thoughts returned towards the more urgent matter of 'how to get out of this mess'.
1112.title: A strange restroom experience!

choices: Fortunately Lindsay went into the other stall!
11121.content:
Unfortunately there wasn't really anything I could do! So I waited, until suddenly the restroom door clicked open. Next the stall's door swinged open! Obviously I forgot to lock it.

Who came in was Lindsay, my arch-nemesis! Oh no, what would she do should she find out it's me?, but my thoughts were interrupted by her exclamation of "Ew! Gross...".
11121.title: After a while someone came in!

111211.content:
Fortunately Lindsay went into the other stall! Once in there I heard her starting to pee. Hey, I could still talk to her..., but I quickly decided against it as I had no idea what she would do with me then!

Finally she left and I was back alone in there! Half an hour later or so another person came in and entered my stall. It was...
111211.title: Fortunately Lindsay went into the other stall!

choices: ... but it was already too late.
1112111.content:
... Ms. Slade, my english teacher! When the mid-twenty-something teacher entered, she looked a bit worried. As she saw me, the diarrhea, swimming in a toilet bowl she instantly grabbed for the flush... only my cry of "Ms. Slade, stop!" came before anything could happen!

Instantly she paused. "Who the hell is this?" she asked. "Ms. Slade, it's me, Kelly Smith!". "Huh, Kelly!? You were supposed to be in my lesson half an hour ago! Where are you?". "I'm here in the toilet bowl!" I answered faithfully and started to shake in there. As Ms. Slade saw this, she gasped "Kelly!? But how...". "Uh, see... I found this magic spell in the library! Is there a note somewhere in the stall? I need it to change back!" I yelled. Now she gasped hard. "Alright, say I believe you... Sorry, but I have to ask: why are you diarrhea in a toilet!?".

Now I had SOMETHING to explain! "See, I was in the restroom earlier when I went out of toilet paper! I tried using this spell to turn the toilet brush into some, but just then the person in the other stall decided to get her squirts out and well, it kind of misfired..." I started, but Ms. Slade interjected with "Oh gross! You said you'd need a note to change back? Guess I found it!" she said and picked it up from the floor.

"Huh, Ecno tihs'otniu oyn-" Ms. Slade started to chant the spell. "No, wait!" I yelled...
1112111.title: ... Ms. Slade, my english teacher!

11121111.content:
... and she stopped immediately, but asked puzzled "What was that for?". "Look," I said, "this spell works with you imagining the change you want to achieve! I don't want you to run the risk of turning into something by mistake like myself earlier!".

"Thanks, that's very thoughtful, Kelly!". "Yes... Ms. Slade, could you please show me the note so I can change back?" I asked. "Oh, of course!" the young teacher said and showed me the note. Next I chanted the spell and went back to normal, still sitting on the toilet bowl."Thanks god!" I panted relieved. Just then Ms. Slade eyed me up closely.

"Well, young lady, that was the most interesting reason someone flunked my class this time!" she said, and then we both started to laugh. "So, this is one hell of an interesting thing you've found there!". Just then her mobile started to vibrate. "Oh no, I have to go back teaching your class...". Just then she eyed me up again. "Uh, Kelly, you know you're one of my best students?". "Yeah Ms. Slade, what are you hinting at?" I wondered. "Well, how about you teaching my class today?". "What!?" I gasped.

"Yeah, you'll turn into me and go teach the class. How does that sound too you?". "Cool! But what will you do in the mean time?". Now she smiled at me vividly. "I'll...".
11121111.title: ... and she stopped immediately.

111211111.content:
"... stay around, of course! With that spell I could disguise myself perfectly as I saw with you, only I most likely won't turn into something disgusting! Or will I?" she said with a smirk. Just then I spotted an obvious flaw in her idea! I could look like her, but my voice would still remain. "Uh, Ms. Slade? The spell only changes your appearance, but not your voice!". "Oh, that's a problem indeed!". Fortunately she had a sudden inspiration! "Could you show me the spell book, please?". Now I pulled it out of my bag,

"Knjiga magije, eh? That's serbic, and luckily I can read that! Could you show me were the transformation spell is?" she asked. Next I flicked to the page where I found it. "Ah, look here: Voice change spell: Imagine the tune you want to speak in and speak these words... Okay, let's try that! Eciov ruoy egnahc 'liwsiht!"she chanted. Next she opened her mouth again, but what came out wasn't her voice, no, it was that of Mickey Mouse! "Did it work?" 'Mickey' asked. "Yes..." I confirmed. Now I read the spell. Once done, I said "Hello, my name is Ms. Slade!" in a perfect imitation of her voice.

"Good, but now we should chant the transformation spells!" she said and so we did!

***

Five minutes later I crossed the hallway, looking and sounding like the young teacher, and walked up to my 'old' classroom., though I still couldn't believe what Ms. Slade had turned into! But I won't go into that, it was really time for Ms. Slade to show up in class!
111211111.title: Ms. Slade speaks like Mickey Mouse

1112111111.content:
So now I stood there, in front of the closed class door, and preparing myself for the oncoming ordeal... Only just then, the door opened from the inside.

"Oh, Ms. Slade! We were already about to search for you!" it came from Ashley, one of my, if not my best friend! "Uh... Ash...-ley. no need for that!" I said and so we both went back into class.

"Alright boys and girls, break's over!" I said in an authoritarian tone, just like Ms. Slade usually did! Luckily Ms. Slade filled me in on today's lesson plan.
1112111111.title: Teaching the class!

11121111111.content:
"Now, all of you will write an essay about the topic we talked about before...".
"Er, Ms. Slade? What about Kelly?" it suddenly came from Lindsay, my arch-nemesis.
"Actually Kelly is excused for today! She'll write the essay at home and hand it to me tomorrow." I quickly replied.
"Any questions?" I asked, but there were none. "Good! And now start, you've got one hour!" I said and sat on 'my' desk.

So now I waited... and waited...
11121111111.title: Writing essays!

As I looked in her face, I saw that she was serious.

"Alright, then I'll go, you keep that journal and meet me at this toilet tommorrow before class starts. Ill tell you what happened and I can be just in time to teach class." said Ms. slade
Next I chanted the spell and turned Ms. Slade into a pile of shit with a Mickey Mouse voice.

http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/7770/...

I quickly shrugged her off - after all I couldn't tell her what happened in the restroom and go out to the field without giving any evidence.

So now I quickly got dressed and joined the others.
